thread.title: 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers: Sellas Tetteh and Sierra Leone's chance to bounce back against Chad
thread.title_full: 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers: Sellas Tetteh and Sierra Leone's chance to bounce back against Chad

title: 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers: Sellas Tetteh and Sierra Leone's chance to bounce back against Chad
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 03:55 CET 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers: Sellas Tetteh and Sierra Leone's chance to bounce back against Chad - www.ghanasoccernet.com Sellas Tetteh 
Sellas Tetteh and his Sierra Leone side are in danger of crashing out of the 2018 World Cup qualifiers. 
After losing to Les Sao 1-0 on Saturday, they will be looking for a return to form against their Central African opposition on Tuesday when they host Chad in the 2018 FIFA World Cup qualification return fixture. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
